title: Ace of Wands
description: Unusually high sales figures and the stench of sex magic at a shop called The Ace of Wands draw the attention of paranormal investigator Nicholas Pardoner and his Vampire sidekick Alex. Dark forces are at work, but is the sex magic the only reason Nick is seeing Alex as a different sort of partner, or is Alex working a little sex magic of his own?Nicholas and Alex debuted in Morgan Ferdinand's Everyday Spectre, The Pardoner's Tale.
author: Morgan Ferdinand
